card.name: Search the Unknown
card.text: Search your library for a creature card with mana value X or less, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Undercover (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. If it would die, exile it face down without revealing it instead. You may cast it face up while it's exiled this way.)

card.name: Cover Up
card.text: Put target artifact or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.

card.name: Songstress of the River
card.text: Accomplice (Whenever another creature you control attacks, you may tap this creature.) Whenever Songstress of the River becomes an accomplice, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

card.name: Sleuthhound
card.text: When Sleuthhound enters, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Investi-Gator
card.text: When Investi-Gator enters, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Investi-Gator gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Dust Smugglers
card.text: Accomplice (Whenever another creature you control attacks, you may tap this creature.) Whenever Dust Smugglers becomes an accomplice, the creature it accompliced gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Dose of Dust
card.text: You gain 6 life. Undercover (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. If it would die, exile it face down without revealing it instead. You may cast it face up while it's exiled this way.)

card.name: Alluring Spirit
card.text: When Alluring Spirit enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target face-down creature you control. Each face-down creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Embiggen
card.text: Target creature gets +5/+5, gains trample, and becomes a Horror in addition to its other creature types until end of turn. It can't be blocked by more than one creature this turn.

card.name: Share the Concoction
card.text: Choose one — • Creatures you control get +2/+2 until end of turn. • Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt to you this turn. Draw a card.

card.name: Towering Aracatnid
card.text: Vigilance, reach

card.name: Following the Matchbook
card.text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Decipher the Evidence
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Vine Street Stoolie
card.text: When Vine Street Stoolie dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Fox Agency Sleuths
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a noncreature permanent, create a 1/1 green Detective creature token. This ability triggers no more than twice each turn.

card.name: Sewer Gators
card.text: Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, you gain 1 life.

card.name: Jericho's Assistant
card.text: Whenever another creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Moribund Witness
card.text: When Moribund Witness dies, you gain 2 life and investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Lamb of the Aberrant
card.text: When Lamb of the Aberrant dies, create a 4/4 green Mutant creature token.

card.name: Rhulha, the Aberrant
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, return a card at random from your graveyard to your hand. You may cast Rhulha, the Aberrant from your graveyard by discarding two cards in addition to paying its other costs.

card.name: Writhing Thrasher
card.text: Trample

card.name: Snitch Snacker
card.text: Reach, trample Snitch Snacker enters with X +1/+1 counters on it. When Snitch Snacker enters, you gain X life.

card.name: Outlands Farmer
card.text: {T}: Add {G}.

card.name: Resounding Shot
card.text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control. Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Occultist's Gambit
card.text: Exile the top five cards of your library. When you do, choose one — • Put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. • Create a 6/6 green Horror creature token with trample.

card.name: Protective Detective
card.text: Flash When Protective Detective enters, another target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Undercover (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. If it would die, exile it face down without revealing it instead. You may cast it face up while it's exiled this way.)

card.name: Mystery of the Strange Door
card.text: Whenever you cast a creature spell, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") At the beginning of each end step, if you sacrificed three or more Clues this turn, you may put a creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

card.name: Manipulative Phantom
card.text: When Manipulative Phantom enters, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, target creature an opponent controls blocks this turn if able.

card.name: Bizarre Menagerie
card.text: When Bizarre Menagerie enters, create a 4/4 green Mutant creature token. {6}{G}{G}: Create a 4/4 green Mutant creature token.

card.name: Lotus Lane Socialite
card.text: Accomplice (Whenever another creature you control attacks, you may tap this creature.) Whenever Lotus Lane Socialite becomes an accomplice, the creature it accompliced can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less this turn.

card.name: Unexplained Behemoth
card.text: Unexplained Behemoth can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Undercover (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. If it would die, exile it face down without revealing it instead. You may cast it face up while it's exiled this way.)

card.name: Fox Agency Operator
card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to an opponent, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.

card.name: Uncover Evidence
card.text: Return target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. Undercover (You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. If it would die, exile it face down without revealing it instead. You may cast it face up while it's exiled this way.)

card.name: Uncanny Woodghast
card.text: Uncanny Woodghast has all activated abilities of all lands you control.

card.name: Barton, Sleuth Extraordinaire
card.text: If an effect would create one or more noncreature tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead. {B}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Ameret, Hope of Night
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if there are six or more loyalty counters on Ameret, they become an 5/5 Angel creature with flying and indestructible until end of turn. Create a 1/1 red and white Cleric creature tokens with lifelink and haste. Ameret deals X damage to any target. You gain X life.

card.name: Chief of District Nine
card.text: Other attacking creatures you control get +1/+0. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to Chief of District Nine during your turn.

card.name: Incident on Fourth Street
card.text: You may cast spells as though they had flash. Whenever you cast a spell, Incident on Fourth Street deals 1 damage to each opponent.

card.name: Prying Lawmaker
card.text: Whenever you draw a card, you gain 1 life. {2}{W}{U}: Draw a card.

card.name: Cult Leader
card.text: When Cult Leader enters, you may exile target creature. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and mana of any type can be spent to cast that spell.

card.name: Eldritch Spirit
card.text: Flying, trample Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on Eldritch Spirit.

card.name: Wayward Lawkeeper
card.text: Flying, vigilance Whenever an opponent disturbs the peace, investigate. (Casting a spell on an opponent's turn and one or more creatures dealing combat damage to an opponent disturb the peace.)

card.name: Frankie the Spider Lorre
card.text: When Frankie "the Spider" Lorre enters, create two 1/1 black Warrior creature tokens. Whenever a creature you control dies, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Elusive Stranger
card.text: Whenever you cast a face-down spell or a spell from exile, Elusive Stranger gets +2/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

card.name: Black Dogs of Eve's Garden
card.text: When Black Dogs of Eve's Garden enters, you may return up to one target creature you don't control and up to one target creature card in a graveyard to their owners' hands.

card.name: Painter of the Waking Dream
card.text: When Painter of the Waking Dream enters, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, create a tapped 3/3 black Horror creature token.

card.name: Perfect Crime
card.text: This spell can't be countered. Exile target creature. Exile Perfect Crime.

card.name: Agency Detectives
card.text: Accomplice (Whenever another creature you control attacks, you may tap this creature.) Whenever a creature you control becomes an accomplice, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on the creature it accompliced.

card.name: Gregor Eddie, Dustmaker
card.text: Haste Whenever Gregor Eddie, Dustmaker attacks, you may discard any number of cards. When you do, up to X target creatures each get +X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of cards discarded this way.

card.name: Scandalous Phantom
card.text: Flying Whenever you disturb the peace for the first time each turn, draw a card. (Casting a spell on an opponent's turn and one or more creatures dealing combat damage to an opponent disturb the peace.)

card.name: Loose End Cutter
card.text: Deathtouch Creatures you control have "{2}, Sacrifice this creature: Draw a card."

card.name: Moroii Cabalist

card.name: Lorre Underboss
card.text: Accomplice (Whenever another creature you control attacks, you may tap this creature.) Whenever Lorre Underboss becomes an accomplice, each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

card.name: Attentive Rabota
card.text: Face-down spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Face-down creatures you control get +1/+1.

card.name: Contraband Dagger
card.text: Equipped creature gets +1/+0 and has menace. Equip {2}

card.name: Detective's Familiar
card.text: Flying Activated abilities of artifacts you control cost {1} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the amount of mana an ability costs to activate to less than one mana.

card.name: Forged Documents
card.text: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-0. {1}{U}, Sacrifice Forged Documents: Draw a card.

card.name: The Masked Benefactor
card.text: Other creatures you control have accomplice. (They have "Whenever another creature you control attacks, you may tap this creature.") Whenever a creature becomes an accomplice to The Masked Benefactor, put a +1/+1 counter on The Masked Benefactor. The Masked Benefactor gains first strike until end of turn if that creature had first strike. The same is true for double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, protection, and trample.

card.name: Unlicensed Pistol
Impenetrable Vault
card.text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger. {2}, Sacrifice Impenetrable Vault: Draw a card.

card.name: Murder Weapon
Pilfered Jewels
card.text: {1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color. {2}, Sacrifice Pilfered Jewels: Draw a card.

card.name: Portrait of the Lost
card.text: When Portrait of the Lost enters, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains "When you control no Clues, sacrifice this creature." {1}{B}, Sacrifice Portrait of the Lost: Draw a card.

card.text: Vigilance {1}{G}, Sacrifice Rabota Bystander: Draw a card.

card.name: Shroud of Disguise

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Warped Landscape: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Lurker on the Walls
card.text: Flying Whenever Lurker on the Walls attacks, reveal the top three cards of defending player's library. Exile one of them, then play it without paying its mana cost. You lose life equal to its mana value. Put the rest of the revealed cards on the bottom of their owner's library in a random order.

card.name: Vile Blessing

card.name: Failing Flaw

card.name: True Love's Moment
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if you've disturbed the peace this turn. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.
